name: General Motors
desc: Collaborated on a Java and Spring Boot based project with a team of 6 talented engineers, optimizing the performance of a microservice by about 96.4% (measured in terms of compilation and execution time of the project) and reducing it's tech debt by 23% (measured in terms of resource utilisation).
Improved the UI of a Teams bot service, improving it's effectiveness for the stakeholders by 25% (survey-based).

Spearheaded the development of a new front-end architecture for our project's unified website, utilizing the best industrial UI/UX practises, resulting in a 15% increase in user engagement as compared to the previous iteration, without any increase in cost, in terms of development times and resources.

Worked with senior software engineers across several timezones, streamlining the usability and user-friendliness of crucial internal Power BI reports, optimising screen real estate usage, thereby decreasing the number of reports required for the same data by 33%.
